cleaned_text: How We Can Help! Oriental Medicine, Acupuncture and Herbs is a wonderful and natural way to help with pain, stress management, digestive complaints, emotional disharmony and so much more. This ancient medicine has been used for centuries to help relieve many ailments that we may experience. Successes! Dr. Giglio has had success with treating chronic and acute pain, digestive disorders, drug/alcohol withdrawal, emotional disorders and so much more. Set up your appointment to get the relief you need today! Why Oriental Medicine? Acupuncture & herbs are natural ways to heal the body. Chinese medicine has been around for thousands of years and there is a reason it has stood the test of time. This effective medicine is able to treat most anything. Focusing on finding patterns of imbalance in the body, Oriental Medicine is able to use the pattern presented to treat the whole person, not just the symptoms. Acupuncture Acupuncture is a comprehensive medical protocol focused on correcting imbalances of energy in the body. From its origin in China thousands of years ago, acupuncture has traditionally been used to prevent, diagnose and treat disease, as well as to improve general health and quality of life. Acupuncture has been gaining recognition as more western scientific studies are supporting the effectiveness of this protocol for many ailments the body may develop. Modalities Along with acupuncture, herbal medicine is used to help restore and balance the body's natural functions. Herbal therapy, just like acupuncture, can prevent and treat many disease processes the body may acquire. Cupping and tui-na are used in Oriental Medicine as well to help facilitate the body's natural circulation and healing processes.
